CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides the high hole mobility , the blend also presented high electron mobility in range of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ( see Figure S7 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| blend |

The material name "blend" is identified in the paragraph. It is a general term that refers to a mixture of two or more substances, but without more specific information, it is difficult to provide a more precise material name.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| blend |

The word "blend" is the only clear material name in the paragraph. The other terms, such as "high hole mobility" and "high electron mobility," refer to properties of materials rather than the materials themselves.

Paragraph: Besides the high hole mobility , the blend also presented high electron mobility in range of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ( see Figure S7 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| high electron mobility |

Note: The units for the electron mobility are given as "4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1", which I have kept the same in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| high electron mobility |

Note: Both "high hole mobility" and "high electron mobility" are clear material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Besides the high hole mobility , the blend also presented high electron mobility in range of 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ( see Figure S7 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| high electron mobility |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| 4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| high electron mobility |

Explanation:

* "high hole mobility" and "high electron mobility" are values of material properties
* "Figure S7" is not a value of a material property, it is a reference to a figure in the source material
* "cm^2 V -1 s^-1" is a unit of measurement, not a value of a material property. It is included here because it is part of the value "4.4 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1" which is a value of a material property.
